Uses of Package
tools.httpserver

Packages that use tools.httpserver
icap.services.resources.gs icap services specific resources 
tools.httpserver Basic HTTP / HTTPS server for Server administration.
Attention: this server is used for convenience in order to avoid the need of installing/configuring external server.
No security audit nor intrusion tests have been performed on it. 
tools.httpserver.custom Specific pages adaptation for GreasySpoon administration 
 

Classes in tools.httpserver used by icap.services.resources.gs
HttpConstants
          HTTP constants used to describe requests and access rights
HttpConstants.RIGHTS
          Access rights that can be attached to a user connection to administration server
 

Classes in tools.httpserver used by tools.httpserver
HtmlModel
          Define HTML model, which must be extended to create an HTML page usable by server.
HtmlRedirect
          Define a HTTP redirection message using a 302 or javascript.
HttpConstants
          HTTP constants used to describe requests and access rights
HttpConstants.METHOD
          HTTP request methods
HttpConstants.RIGHTS
          Access rights that can be attached to a user connection to administration server
PoolThreads
          PoolThreads class allow to manage a thread pool for client connections.
User
          Simple user account class
UserSession
          Thread allowing to manage a connection between a user (web browser) and the http(s) server.
 

Classes in tools.httpserver used by tools.httpserver.custom
HtmlFile
          Create an HTML page using file content stored onto disk.
HttpConstants
          HTTP constants used to describe requests and access rights
HttpConstants.RIGHTS
          Access rights that can be attached to a user connection to administration server
User
          Simple user account class
UserTransaction
          This class integrate methods to analyze HTTP message between a client (browser) and the http(s) server.
